name: postal
description: Postal is a self-hosted mail delivery platform designed for sending and managing large volumes of email. It supports SMTP, webhooks, message logging, and domain management with full control over infrastructure.
features: SMTP delivery: Send transactional and marketing emails through a reliable SMTP server infrastructure.
Webhook integration: Receive real-time notifications for delivery events, bounces, and opens via webhooks.
Message logging: Track all sent emails with detailed logs including delivery status and recipient activity.
Domain management: Configure and manage multiple sending domains with DKIM and SPF authentication.
Queue management: Monitor and control email queues with retry logic and delivery scheduling.
Bounce handling: Automatically process bounces and suppress invalid email addresses to maintain sender reputation.
API access: Send emails programmatically using a RESTful API with comprehensive documentation.
IP pool management: Distribute sending across multiple IP addresses to optimize deliverability and reputation.
Suppression lists: Maintain lists of unsubscribed or bounced addresses to ensure compliance and reduce spam.
Statistics dashboard: View sending metrics, delivery rates, and engagement statistics in real-time.
Multi-organization: Support multiple organizations or clients with isolated email infrastructure and credentials.
Rate limiting: Control sending rates per domain or organization to prevent abuse and maintain deliverability.
